extensionDescription.message: Web copilot for all, free & open-source!

Let_me_tell_you_about_this_crazy_useful_.message:
Hey man, there's this sick new browser-based AI called Webpilot that can do everything automatically, way better than ChatGPT. Plus, it's open source and totally free with no wait list. 
You can start using it right now over at http://webpilot.ai/.

Remember_to_select_text__If_using_for_th.message: Remember to select text. If using for the first time, refresh the page

Auth_key_not_available__please_reset.message: Invalid key. Try another or contact the key provider.

Generating_content__takes_about_a_few_se.message: Generating content, takes about a few seconds

Summarize_and_express_these_words_concis.message: Summarize and express these words concisely

Refine_text__review_and_revise_problems_.message: Refine text, review and revise problems in spelling, grammar, punctuation, word usage, and sentence structure

Identify_any_logical_or_factual_errors_i.message: Refute this viewpoint with data and facts, objectively and politely, limited to one paragraph.

About_to_clear_the_auth_key_and_restore_.message: About to clear the auth key and restore all preset functions

What_do_you_want_to_do_with_the_selected.message: What do you want to do with the selected text?

How_to_use__1__Select_text_on_the_webpag.message:
How to use:
1. Select text on the webpage, click button

How_to_use__1__Ask_a_question_about_sele.message:
How to use:
1. Ask a question about selected text on the webpage, or take it as prompt

Auto_Pop_Mode__1__Click_top_right_icon_t.message:
Auto-Pop Mode:
1. Click top-right icon to toggle
2. Pop-up when text selected

Turbo_Mode__1__Click_lightning_icon_to_t.message:
Turbo Mode:
1. Click lightning icon to toggle
2. Auto process selected text
3. Auto copy the result
